title: no keys...for weeks
body:
i havent received any keys for a long time whats going on?

the last time i got keys...i bought them -_- this was on 8/19, i havent received any keys since from playing games...

replies.body: Looking into this for you, I saw that you were able to receive 6 fragments in a week.  The system is based on a curve, meaning that the drop rate will continue to decrease the more you earn them.  This will reset roughly every 30 days and grant them at an increase rate again.  Rinse and repeat.  More information on this is available available on our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!
*up to a maximum of 12 key shards per 28 days.

http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-en/KZnWzcGK-hextech-crafting-and-mastery-frequently-asked-questions

> "Based on the current tuning rates it's possible to earn 4 keys (12 fragments) in a 4 week period..." ([Source](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-en/KZnWzcGK-hextech-crafting-and-mastery-frequently-asked-questions) \)
